component.name: mki3dgame
component.summary: A simple OpenGL game of searching for tokens in 3D stages.

description.p: A simple OpenGL game of searching for tokens in 3D stages. You also have to avoid the monsters. (They can capture you.)
Any user can prepare his own assets with stages, monsters and tokens designned with MKI3D (https://mki1967.github.io/mki3d/) as explained in https://github.com/mki1967/mki3dgame/blob/master/README.md
